title: ECE Starter Pokemon
detail: 18-100 ECE LAB kit that follows you around
extended_details:
We had three plans on making a ECE lab kit that follows us. 1) one ultrasonic sensor
for distance and two IR sensors for direction. 2) three ultrasonic sensors. 3) Bluetooth
controlled car. During build week, we went with plan two and used three ultrasonic sensors
to sense distance and direction. We also worked on the bluetooth module to make our lab
kit remote-controlled, but we couldn’t get the bluetooth module to work with the app.
